column1: Pablo Pineda (born 1974) is a Spanish actor who received the Concha de Plata Award at the 2009 San Sebastián International Film Festival for his performance in the film Yo
column2: también.  In the film he plays the role of a university graduate with Down syndrome
column3: which is quite similar to his real life.

column1: Pineda lives in Málaga and has worked at the municipality. He holds a diploma in Teaching and a BA in Educational psychology. He was the first student with Down syndrome in Europe to obtain a university degree. In the future he wants to make his career in teaching
column2: instead of acting. Upon his arrival back to Málaga
column5: welcomed him with the "Shield of the City" award on behalf of the city council.

column1: At the time he was promoting his film and giving lectures on incapacity and education
column2: as he has been doing for many years.

column1: Pineda currently works with the Adecco Foundation in Spain
column2: giving presentations at conferences on the labour-integration plan that the foundation is carrying out with him. In 2011 Pablo talked in Colombia (Bogota
column4: demonstrating the social inclusion of people with disabilities.Pineda also collaborates with the "Lo que de verdad importa" Foundation.
